title: Bug 8142: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: When I hit F4 on a binary project selection, the scoped type hierarchy is not displayed.
OB: The bug report does not provide any information about the observed behavior.
EB: The scoped type hierarchy should be displayed when hitting F4 on a binary project selection.
SR:
To reproduce the bug, perform the following steps:
1. Open a binary project.
2. Select a file within the project.
3. Press the F4 key.
